data.name: Mosaic Hearts Prototype Demo
data.detailed_description:
Jonn returns to his hometown and finds it in the middle of a territory war! Jonn and a girl out for revenge, Mary, team up to try and stop it! Jonn teams up with each boss that he faces to become strong enough to take down the final boss, Noel!


EVERY enemy is a (potential) new best friend!
Fight each boss, gain them as an ally, explore, and platform your way through each level. Build a strong group that can take down the final boss, Noel Weisburg.

​In the game, you can:​
  • Customize your combos!
  • Make friends of your enemies​
  • Interact with funny unique characters!
  • Cook food to help you grow stronger!
  • Never read this list again!​

data.short_description: EVERY enemy is a potential new best friend! The town of Morilet has been swept up in a Territory War and it's up to Jonn and Mary to save it! Fight each boss, gain them as an ally, and fight your way through each level. Build a strong group that can take down the final boss, Noel Weisburg.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10(64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 8250U CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10(64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 9750H CPU 2.60GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
